name: Adam Kowalski
story: Adam Kowalski grew up in a poor village in Poland. He joined the military to escape poverty and found himself aligned with the INDEPENDENT faction in Arma 3. His impulsive nature often leads him to act recklessly in combat, but his efficiency in looting supplies for his team is unparalleled. Despite his tough exterior, Adam has a soft spot for his family back home and sends his earnings to support them whenever possible.
